conbody.p: Do not include any unlinked text in the related links linklist element; it should contain only link elements.

p.draft-comment: The schema prevents this anyway? Furphy?
This topic was Related Links Groups

section.title: Rationale
section.p: Answering a question about whether additional text is allowed within the link element but outside the child linktext element:

lq.reftitle: Kris Eberlein, Yahoo! DITA Users Group
lq.p: Having text like that plays havoc with localization anyway, so it was just too much trouble to even try.
Go with relationship tables. Remember that you can use multiple relationship tables, if that makes them easier for you to work with.
